comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: This contest will run from TODAY (time of this post) until December 31st 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).Best of luck to you all and remember that you can only participate in two different categories so choose wisely

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Hi Hhampuz,I want to ask few question:1. Handrawn art (pen and paper) does this mean we can only use pen as the tool? which is only black color or we can use pencil color too? Also if I draw using water color, it's fit handrawn art or painting art?2. Does the animation art only for digital? does stop motion is included too?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on November 24, 2022, 12:36:39 AM1. Handrawn art (pen and paper) does this mean we can only use pen as the tool? which is only black color or we can use pencil color too? Also if I draw using water color, it's fit handrawn art or painting art?There are colored pen too you know. So this won't do for black pen only. But it still depends on the work of art of any one.For the water color, this would probably fall for painting art,  since the hand-drawn art falls for pen and paper only.Quote from: Apocollapse on November 24, 2022, 12:36:39 AM2. Does the animation art only for digital? does stop motion is included too?Since both will fall for digital art, any art with an animation on it either .gif or .apng or any video file extension will fall to animation art, non-animated digital will fall on the other one.Of course, this is what i only understand, Hhampuz and co. have say on this so lets wait him on this.

comments.author: malcovi2
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on November 24, 2022, 12:36:39 AM Also if I draw using water color, it's fit handrawn art or painting art?using water color goes into painting art.

Handrawn art (pen and paper) does this mean we can only use pen as the tool? which is only black color or we can use pencil color too? Also if I draw using water color, it's fit handrawn art or painting art?There are colored pen too you know. So this won't do for black pen only. But it still depends on the work of art of any one.For the water color, this would probably fall for painting art,  since the hand-drawn art falls for pen and paper only. If you use a brush then it will be a painting. Quote from: PX-Z on November 24, 2022, 03:16:39 AMQuote from: Apocollapse on November 24, 2022, 12:36:39 AM2. Does the animation art only for digital? does stop motion is included too?Since both will fall for digital art, any art with an animation on it either .gif or .apng or any video file extension will fall to animation art, non-animated digital will fall on the other one.Of course, this is what i only understand, Hhampuz and co. have say on this so lets wait him on this. I think as long as it moves it will fall on Animation art. Digital art may mean digital drawing or something.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Hand Drawn:Whenever you use pens and papers or similar. You do not use "live colors" or paint brushes and similar.Painting Art:Whenever you use "live colors" on a canvas or similar. Water color paintings would likely fall under this category.Digital Art:The category that is often represented the most among winners in our art contests. You use any digital means whether it's paint or photoshop or illustrator to create your artwork - this is digital art.Animation Art:Animated shorts, videos, gif or anything else that is not static content but more layered would fit under this category.Craft Art:Clay figures, clothes, wood carvings, box carvings, basically whenever you use a bunch of different material to create an artwork (non-digital) it would fall under this category. I would also consider writing or playing a song to be considered a craft.

I would also consider writing or playing a song to be considered a craft.ReservedSo I can decide to do my work in any of the categories above?

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: DaNNy001 on November 24, 2022, 04:50:36 PM<snip>So I can decide to do my work in any of the categories above? Based on the OP, you can join up to TWO (2) categories. Moreover, I assume that we're only allowed to submit ONE (1) artwork in each category. So from how I understood it, TWO (2) artworks are the MAXIMUM entries that you have for this whole Winter Holiday Art Contest.Good luck!
